```{r}

library(nlme)

  mutate(RGR_BA = BAI/BA_2013)

```


### Modeling

```{r}
fit1 <- gls(ANN_INC ~ TREATMENT + SPECIES, data = growth)
plot(resid(fit1) ~ growth$TREATMENT)
plot(resid(fit1) ~ growth$SPECIES)
summary(fit1)
```

```{r}
vf2 <- varIdent(form= ~ 1 | TREATMENT * SPECIES)
fit_identvar <- gls(ANN_INC ~ TREATMENT + SPECIES, data = growth, weights = vf2)
summary(fit_identvar)
```

```{r}
E2 <- resid(fit_identvar, type = "normalized")
coplot(E2 ~ TREATMENT | SPECIES, data = growth,
ylab = "Normalised residuals")
```

```{r}
anova(fit1, fit_identvar)
```
